section.title: Infinitive of purpose
section.sectiontitle: Use an infinitive (to + verb) to show the purpose or reason for an action.
section.text1: I'm learning English because I want to get a better job.
section.text1a: I'm learning English to get a better job.
section.text2: I went to the shops because I wanted to buy some milk.
section.text2a: I went to the shops to buy some milk.
